Catalog_Raisonne: Franklin, p.192; Sparling 40; Tomkinson 40; PMM 367; Huntington Library (Great Books in Great Editions) 24; Needham 101A; Peterson A40; Ransom (Private Presses) 40; Garvey 45; Ray 258; Walsdorf 40;  V & A 9
artist: Designer: William Morris; Author: Geoffrey Chaucer; Illustrator: Edward Coley Burne-Jones; Engraver: Wood engravings by William Harcourt Hooper; Editor: Frederick S. Ellis; Printer: William Morris at Kelmscott Press, Hammersmith, England; Publisher: Kelmscott Press, Hammersmith, England
creditline: The Frank P. Leslie Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Frank P. Leslie in memory of Mr. and Mrs. John Leslie
medium: Wood engravings, letterpress in black and red ink, bound volume
provenance: (Sold to Leslie by unknown vendor, London, England, c. 1952); Frank P. Leslie, Wayzata, Minn., c. 1952-67; given to MIA, 1967.
title: The Works of Geoffrey Chaucer, now Newly Imprinted
